mapper.insert: insert into REVIEWS (rating, content, liked_count, report_count, customer_id, store_id) values (#{rating}, #{content}, #{likedCount}, #{reportCount}, #{customer.id}, #{store.id})
mapper.select: select id, rating, content, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate, liked_count as likedCount, report_count as reportCount, disabled, blocked, customer_id as "customer.id", store_id as "store.id" from REVIEWS where id = #{value};

select id, rating, content, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate, liked_count as likedCount, report_count as reportCount, disabled, blocked, customer_id as "customer.id", store_id as "store.id" from REVIEWS where customer_id = #{value};
